column2: Let's you change the amount of gold you can send.
Do you want to be able to send 25 gold to a character?
Do you want to be able to send 50 gold to a character?
Do you want to be able to send 100 gold to a character?
Do you want to be able to send 250 gold to a character?
Do you want to be able to send 500 gold to a character?
Do you want to be able to send 1000 gold to a character?
Remove the ability to change the send gold amount.
